tool_description: Realtime aviation data inclusive of flight information, aircraft status, performance and statistics by Akrx extensive database.
name: AkRx
title: AkRx

api_list.name: flightsSearch
api_list.description: This API returns in response details of the flight, which can be searched by aircraft registration or flight code.

api_list.name: allAirportsSearchByLocation
api_list.description:
This API allows you to find all airports, large, medium and small ones in defined area, which is suitable for presenting airports on map in specified zoom.
 You can also search airports by IATA code, airline name or city where is located. 
**NOTICE**:  parameters lat1 (latitude) and lon1 (longitude) have to have higher values than lat2 and lon2.

api_list.name: large&mediumAirportsSearchByLocation
api_list.description:
This API allows you to find large and medium airports in defined area, which is suitable for presenting airports on map in specified zoom.
 You can also search airports by IATA code, airline name or city where is located. 
**NOTICE**:  parameters lat1 (latitude) and lon1 (longitude) have to have higher values than lat2 and lon2.

api_list.name: largeAirportsSearchByLocation
api_list.description:
This API allows you to find only large airports in defined area, which is suitable for presenting airports on map in specified zoom.
 You can also search airports by IATA code, airline name or city where is located. 
**NOTICE**:  parameters lat1 (latitude) and lon1 (longitude) have to have higher values than lat2 and lon2.

api_list.name: airportBasicSearchByIATA
api_list.description: Returns an airport basic data, airport name, IATA, ICAO and the city where the airport is located. You have to enter airport IATA code to start the search.

api_list.name: airportSearchByAnyEnter
api_list.description:
Enables you to get detailed airport data by entering few characters which will be input information for search by airport name, city, ,airport ICAO,  elevation (ft), iso country, iso region, gps code, local code, latitude, longitude.
Response of this data is suitable for table display because you have offset and limit like input parameters.

api_list.name: airportDetailedSearch
api_list.description: This API can provide you detailed airport data and you can search for them by Airport Name, airport ICAO, country, Airport Type, elevation (ft), isco country, iso region, latitude and longitude. Data that you get is suitable for tables because you have offset and limit like input parameters.

api_list.name: airlineDropdownByICAO
api_list.description:
This API allowes you to search for basic airlines data by entering 2 characters of ICAO code.
It is suitable for your search by ICAO dropdown .
NOTE: Airline logos will come soon.

api_list.name: airlineDropdownByIATA
api_list.description:
This API allowes you to search for basic airlines data by entering 2 characters of IATA code.
It is suitable for your search by IATA dropdown .
NOTE: Airline logos will come soon.

api_list.name: airlineDropdownByName
api_list.description:
This API allowes you to search for basic airlines data by entering few characters of airline name.
It is suitable for your search by Airline Name dropdown .
NOTE: Airline logos will come soon.

api_list.name: airlineSearchByAnyEnter
api_list.description: It allowes you to get detailed airline data by enter of few characters which can represent Airline Name, IATA, ICAO .

api_list.name: Local DateTime Converter
api_list.description: Get Date and Time for loaction defined by latidude and longitude.

api_list.name: airlineSearch
api_list.description:
You can get list of airlines by searching theirs Airline Name, IATA, ICAO and number of aircraft in their fleet. This APi is suitable for data display in a table because it has offset and limit like input parameters. 
NOTICE: attribue "logo" in airlineLogos object will be available soon in binary form.

api_list.name: aircraftFullTypeDropdown
api_list.description: Ideal for dropdown list of Aircraft Type. It is enough to enter few characters of aircraft type and get list of Aircraft Types which contains entered string.

api_list.name: aircraftTypeCodesDropdown
api_list.description: Ideal for dropdown list of aircraft Type codes (A320, B722, B737, ... ). It is enough to inpsert 2 characters and get an array of object which contains aircraft type code and the number of aircraft with  that aircraft type in our database.

api_list.name: aircraftSearchByFleetRegistration
api_list.description: Allow you tu make a search by first two characters of aircraft registration. Response will be an array of objects containing typeCode, aircraftType, registration and modeS.

api_list.name: aircraftSearchByAnyEnter
api_list.description: Enables search for detailed aircraft data by enter of few characters. Entered characters can be interpreted like Airline Name, Aircraft Type, Registration, Serial Number. It is suitable for results display in a table because you have like input parameters offset and limit.

api_list.name: aircraftBasicSearch
api_list.description: Get basic aircraft data ( type code, aircraft type, registration and modeS ) by search string. When you enter few characters and start your search it will search aircraft's type code,  aircraft type and registration by Contains method. This API is ideal for Search box on your frontend application.

api_list.name: aircraftDetailedSearch
api_list.description: Detailed aircraft data. You can search aircraft by airline, operator, aircraft type, full aircraft type (Airbus A320-232), serial number, modeS, manufacture date.  You can use it for tabels because it has offset and limit like query parameters.
